Methods in jade.core that return Actor
 Actor Actor.holder()
          Returns the current holder of the Actor, or null if it is not held.

Methods in jade.core with parameters of type Actor
 void World.addActor(Actor actor)
          Adds an Actor to the World at a random open tile, as generated by the global instance of Dice with a call to getOpenTile()/

          Returns true if the Actor is held by the specified Actor.
 void World.removeActor(Actor actor)
          Removes an Actor from the World.

 Actor Sprinkler.SprinklerPart.getActor(Dice dice, int x, int y)
